alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wasatch...northwestern Duchesne and south central Summit Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Samak, or 19 miles northeast of Heber City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mirror Lake, Samak and Trial Lk. This includes Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 7 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
